title: i legit need help
body: my league wont stop crashing, i installed wizard 101 and now it closes once it starts to load and its annoying the crap out of me, the bugsplat doesnt even appear it just closes, its so frustrating i feel like i might quit league

replies.body: It kinda sounds like you're able to see the League Logo start to load but the client itself never shows up. If that's the case, it's probably happening if it isn't being run with admin rights. Right-click and try opening League as administrator and let me know if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RYPiZdJr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-15T03:53:16.538+0000)
>
> It kinda sounds like you're able to see the League Logo start to load but the client itself never shows up. If that's the case, it's probably happening if it isn't being run with admin rights. Right-click and try opening League as administrator and let me know if that helps.

its good, i restarted my pc with all non microsoft services off and its been working well since
